reviewText: The lessons are easy to follow.  It is like having your own teacher beside you.

Most new instrumental music teachers are not adept  on all winds and percussion.  This tape explains basic flute technique: embouchure, tone, etc. so the teacher is able to master it quickly.  It also provides a  demonstration for students and all music teachers know that students can  never play better than their own mental image of the sound.  Several in the  band library is a must.
